name: recursive_blog_crawler
description: True recursive web crawler that visits each blog post page and extracts title tags from HTML

parameters.task: Analyze the crawled website data from ovalenzuela.com. The website URL is https://ovalenzuela.com. Review the content and extracted links. Provide a comprehensive analysis including: 1) What type of website this appears to be, 2) Main topics and themes found, 3) Available blog post links and their URLs, 4) Analysis of the blog structure and content patterns, 5) Recommendations for further crawling. Structure the output clearly with sections for each analysis area. If blog post links were discovered, list them with their URLs.
